org.apache.giraph.io.accumulo

    AccumuloVertexOutputFormat<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>

    public abstract static class AccumuloVertexOutputFormat.AccumuloVertexWriter<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
extends org.apache.giraph.io.VertexWriter<I,V,E>
    Main abstraction point for vertex writers to persist back to Accumulo tables.
